doors.title: DOORS
doors.description: We make attractive doors in 100% solid wood designed for main entrances. At Glover, we manage our own wood production to guarantee the exact dimensions we need, which allows us to further specialize in our products and ensure a regular supply.

attributes.title: TEMPERATURE AND NOISE INSULATION. PDA DOORS.
attributes.content: With 4.5 cm thickness of solid wood, providing an excellent thermal and acoustic insulation barrier between the exterior and interior of your home. (With CITEC UBB test reports) PDA DOORS, ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION. With laboratory tests that certify thermal and noise insulation.

attributes.title: STABLE AND DURABLE WOOD OVER TIME
attributes.content: Solid Radiata Pine Wood, with slow drying for 4 to 5 days at temperatures between 65°C to 70°C in a chamber, obtaining a humidity between 8% to 12%, which allows natural wood to behave stably over time.

attributes.title: PAINT THAT PROTECTS AGAINST HUMIDITY AND LIGHT. SOFT TO THE TOUCH.
attributes.content: Door with Italian water-based paints and lacquers, with UV drying and high-quality finishes, which protects against humidity, delivering a soft surface to the touch and very resistant to moderate sun exposure.

attributes.title: FSC CERTIFICATION - SUSTAINABLE FOREST MANAGEMENT
attributes.content: Wood manufactured with FSC Certification, which complies with the highest social and environmental standards in the market, with sustainable forest management.

hero.tagline:
Specialized solutions for local
and international clients

Furniture for bedrooms, living rooms, patios, and terraces.

furniture.description: We work mainly with furniture production, supplying major decoration companies and other clients in the national and export markets. Our experience allows us to offer unique designs that combine functionality and aesthetics, adapting to current market trends.

attributes.title: SPECIALIST IN CLASSIC AND MODERN DESIGNS.
attributes.content: In our company we manufacture high-design furniture that combines elegance, ergonomics, and functionality. Each piece is designed to provide comfort and warmth, with high-quality materials. We create environments where design is lived, felt, and enjoyed.

wood.title: EXPORT WOOD

hero.title: WOOD
hero.tagline:
Semi-finished in Blanks and Boards formats for
international export.

wood.description: We work with semi-finished woods in Blanks and Boards formats for international clients. We have FSC certification to ensure responsible use of wood, respecting the environment. With advanced technology, we manage to work our forests and handle our processes correctly, avoiding negative environmental consequences. Therefore, at Glover we care for the ecosystem from the selection of suppliers to the product that reaches your home.

products.name: Export wood
features: We work with semi-finished woods in Blanks and Boards formats for international clients
Guaranteed FSC certification to ensure responsible use of woods
Advanced technology to work our forests and processes sustainably
We care for the ecosystem from supplier selection to the final product

products.name: Our processes
features: Log yard: Own management with automated systems to maintain optimal conditions
Own sawmill: Ideal dimensions and reduction of wood losses
Thermal unit and drying: 5 integrated chambers to guarantee quality and optimal humidity
Preparation: Digital scanner for imperfection detection and finger joint for panels
Machining: CNC technology to exactly follow industrial design parameters
Assembly and painting: Water-based paints with continuous line and ultraviolet light drying

attributes.title: PREMIUM EXPORT WOOD
attributes.content: We specialize in the manufacturing and export of wood products made from high-quality radiata pine. We carefully select raw materials to ensure durability, performance, and versatility. Our wood adapts to multiple industries such as furniture, construction, and carpentry. We use cutting-edge technology in our processes to achieve superior finishes and dimensional stability. Each production stage has strict quality control. The combination of good raw materials and technology makes us competitive internationally. We comply with high standards of environmental sustainability and efficiency in our exports. We offer a reliable product with added value for clients worldwide.

attributes.title: STABLE AND DURABLE WOOD OVER TIME
attributes.content: Solid Radiata Pine Wood, with slow drying for 4 to 5 days at temperatures between 65°C to 70°C in a chamber, obtaining a humidity between 8% to 12%, which allows natural wood to behave stably over time. Structured with Finger Joint processes.

attributes.title: HIGH PRODUCTIVE CAPACITY AND GLOBAL LOGISTICS
attributes.content: We have a high productive capacity for radiata pine export wood, supported by technified processes that guarantee efficiency, quality, and sustainability at each stage of production. Our operation is supported by specialized labor, which allows us to meet the highest international standards and respond timely to global market demands.

attributes.title: FSC CERTIFICATION - SUSTAINABLE FOREST MANAGEMENT
attributes.content: Wood manufactured with FSC Certification, which complies with the highest social and environmental standards in the market, with sustainable forest management.

structures.title: STRUCTURES

hero.title: STRUCTURES
hero.tagline: Manufacturing of bed bases, sofas and backboards.

structures.description: We manufacture bed bases, sofa frames and backboards. Thanks to our computer numerical control (CNC) technology, we follow exactly the parameters established by an industrial design, ensuring uniformity in the manufacture of each structure. This precision guarantees that each piece is manufactured with the same quality and finish, avoiding any deviation that could cause defects in the final product.

products.name: Bed Base
features: Solid structure with support for various types of mattresses
Optimized design to maximize storage space
Treated material to resist moisture and wear
Ventilation systems to keep the mattress in optimal conditions

products.name: Sofa Frame
features: Reinforced frame for intensive daily use
Detachable construction to facilitate shipping and assembly
High pressure zones reinforced with noble woods
Compatible with various suspension and padding systems

products.name: Backboards
features: Ergonomic designs adapted to different needs
Internal structure that maintains shape over time
Safe fixing systems for bed bases and sofas
Fixed or modular versions according to customer requirements

attributes.title: RESISTANT AND DURABLE FURNITURE STRUCTURES
attributes.content: We manufacture high-quality wooden structures for furniture, such as sofas, bed headboards, and bed bases. Our pieces are distinguished by being resistant and durable, ideal for guaranteeing stability and comfort in daily use. We employ finger joint technology, which allows a better union of wood pieces, with highly water, humidity, and temperature-change resistant adhesives; for demanding environmental conditions; generating a strong and durable union. All this optimally allows material utilization and increases structural resistance. Thanks to our precise and controlled processes, we offer reliable solutions for the furniture industry.

attributes.title: VERSATILITY
attributes.content: Our wooden structures are carefully designed and assembled according to the specifications of each product line and the requirements of assembly processes. This approach allows us to guarantee precise adaptation to each furniture model, optimizing both functionality and resistance. Additionally, one of its main advantages is that these structures can be easily disassembled, which facilitates their storage or transportation if necessary, without compromising the integrity or durability of the product.

attributes.title: STABLE WOOD OVER TIME
attributes.content: Solid Radiata Pine Wood, with slow drying for 4 to 5 days at temperatures between 65°C to 70°C in a chamber, obtaining a humidity between 8% to 12%, which allows natural wood to behave stably over time.

attributes.title: FSC CERTIFICATION - SUSTAINABLE FOREST MANAGEMENT
attributes.content: Wood manufactured with FSC Certification, which complies with the highest social and environmental standards in the market, with sustainable forest management.

complements.title: COMPLEMENTS

hero.title: COMPLEMENTS
hero.tagline: Furniture and bed legs with fine and durable finishes.

complements.description: We manufacture applications, a wide line of legs with fine finishes for use in furniture and beds. Our preparation process includes a thorough review of the wood using advanced technology. Thanks to this precision, each piece we manufacture will be identical to the previous one, with the same attention to detail and quality that guarantee durability and elegance.

products.name: Bed legs
features: Exclusive designs with fine finishes
Custom manufacturing according to specifications
High quality and durable materials
Customizable finishes to integrate with any style

products.name: Furniture legs
features: Wide variety of designs and heights
Great load capacity and stability
Premium finishes in wood and metal
Adaptable solutions for different types of furniture

attributes.title: FURNITURE AND BED LEGS WITH VARIOUS DESIGNS
attributes.content: We also manufacture wooden legs for beds and various types of furniture such as nightstands, dressers, armchairs, and more. We have a wide variety of designs and styles, adaptable to different aesthetic and functional lines. We offer options in different colors and finishes, which allows personalizing each piece according to customer needs. These legs are made with high-quality materials, guaranteeing resistance and durability.
